a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average performance of 8th graders on the mathematics
Assessed through the TIMSS mathematics scale, with a central point of 500.
TIMSS: Average math performance for 8th grade boys
TIMSS: Average math performance for 8th grade girls
Data source: IEA's Trends in International Mathematics and Science Study via World Bank (2023)
